description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Set sail aboard the legendary Old Spice clipper ship to the 4 FRESHEST destinations on earth! From coolest to warmest you will sail by Matterhorn, Denali, Fiji and Cyprus. A Fresh, Fast Paced Card Game where the object is to be the last player still holding an Old Spice Fresh Destination Deodorant, making you the FRESHERSHIST!
